chara.textHome: Not sure if I really need to introduce myself…
but I'm Kyoko Sakura.
Why am I wearin' a swimsuit?
It's a long story.

This isn't gonna stop me
from fightin', though...

I'm still me, it's just this form
helps me to swim.
Might as well take advantage of it while I can.
Ah!
Now I get it...
Well, you can't do this at the beach.
I've never seen a water slide this big!
I'm gonna try it again.

Just relaxin' on a inflatable
ring isn't that bad.
No wonder it's called a lazy river pool…

It's more relaxin' than the waves
at the beach.
Huh?
This is all thanks to my trainin'...
I guess it was worth it.

I'm surprised how well I can fight
with this beach ball.
It's much more powerful than it looks.

When I told Mami how I fight usin' my
beach ball, she got so excited...
Now she wants to play...

Does beach volleyball really have
anything to do with battles?

I never thought playin' beach volleyball
would help me during battles…

I feel like I can see my enemies' movements
much better now.
Ya never know what will come in handy.
Hey! You came to swim too?

Since I have to wear this thing,
I might as well enjoy it while I can.
It's really hot this morning…
What should I do today...?

I could go for a swim at the beach. 
Fishin' by the river sounds good too,
though....
Okay, yeah!
I'm gonna cook some river fish today!
You haven't had lunch yet?
Here, take some of these.

Madoka gave me some fresh
vegetables this morning.
They're really good!

I'm Kyoko Sakura. It's a long story,
but I'll be fightin' in a swimsuit...
It doesn't look bad, does it?

It's not really my thing, but it is pretty...
summery?

It started rainin'…
Hopefully it gets a little cooler.
*Yawn*
The sound of the rain is makin' me sleepy…
Maybe I'll take a nap.
Oh, I forgot to use the bug spray…
I hate getting' mosquito bites.
They're so itchy and annoyin'…
This sun is scorchin'…
Maybe I'll visit Mami...
She always has iced tea on hand.
This is my transformation for now.

Don't think I'm any weaker just
'cause I'm in a swimsuit...
This beach ball packs a mean punch.
There's a copy of me runnin' around.

I heard it's not totally the same,
but fightin' a copy of my normal Magical Girl
form might be fun.

Let me know if there's a good way
to fall asleep on a hot night.

It was so hot, I couldn't get
comfortable until late…
*Yawn*
So sleepy...

Oh, you found some shade
under this tree too.
It's great, isn't it? It's a bit cooler.
I actually followed some stray cats here.

I hear some drums.
Maybe there's a festival goin' on?
I'm gonna take a look.

There might be some unusual
stalls to check out.
There's so much shellfish near the shore.

All different kinds of sea snails, barnacles,
clams… Boilin' them in their shells
is the best way to go.
You can try some if you want.

I'm not a fan of that watermelon
smashin' game...

If a Magical Girl hits it, it's just
gonna fly everywhere...
What a waste.
I can't believe Mitama did this…
Well, I do get to swim now.
Still, she won't be gettin' any of my thanks.

Hmm, I did think she might
be good at swimmin'…
but wow, she really is fast.
Maybe I'll race Kanagi.
I'm pretty sure I can beat her.

I can borrow a fishin' rod from
Homura or just go divin'…
Different fishin' yields different fish..
I wonder which way would be quicker?
One, two.
One, two… Huh?!

Wh-what do you want?
Is it weird that I stretch before swimmin'?
I just don't wanna get a cramp...
Time for the game—
I mean battle—to begin!!
That wasn't even a warm-up.
My spikes are pretty good, aren't they?
The summer heat can't stop me!

I'm startin' to get used to
usin' this beach ball...
It ain't bad.
I feel invincible!
Come on, try receivin' my serve!
How about a summer story?
Maybe somethin' scary?

Sayaka invited me to go to the
swimmin' pool, but is it really worth it?

I mean, you can just go to the beach,
 and it's free.
